question: Who has been elected as new President of Basketball Federation of India (BFI)?
explanation: K Govindaraj has been re-elected as president of the Basketball Federation of India (BFI). The BFI  is the governing and controlling body of Basketball in India. It is responsible for the development and promotion of the sport at all levels. BFI manages all the national level basketball operations in India. It is involved in organizing training camps and national tournaments, and in preparing Indian teams for both men and women international competitions in various age categories. The national team of India is also called as Young Cagers
